title: Wrap padding
body_html:
Hi all,

I could not find any padding functionality that equals the "wrap" padding from numpy.

E.g. this:
[[0 1 2]
[3 4 5]
[6 7 8]]

Shall be padded like this:
[[8 6 7 8 6]
[2 0 1 2 0]
[5 3 4 5 3]
[8 6 7 8 6]
[2 0 1 2 0]]

Would be of great value!

body:
Hi all,

I could not find any padding functionality that equals the "wrap" padding from numpy.

E.g. this:
[[0 1 2]
 [3 4 5]
 [6 7 8]]

Shall be padded like this:
[[8 6 7 8 6]
 [2 0 1 2 0]
 [5 3 4 5 3]
 [8 6 7 8 6]
 [2 0 1 2 0]]

Would be of great value!
